OOC:  Trelos was inside the prison on the bottom floor of the pasifius
maximal base in atlantis.  He broke out of the base through the lower
tunnel (it used to a secret).  He's now loose in the city again.  I've
written a lot about the base and atlantis in the wiki if you want to
check on the details.

I was confused because you said something about lava, and there isnt
any lava near to where they are.

On 8/24/07, xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
> OOC: Where is trelos?
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> >
> > Salveo and the troopers turned the final turns of the crank which
> > raised the door and cleared the hallway.  Guardia, Salveo, and the
> two
> > troopers dash for the front enterance.
> >
> > Meanwhile...
> >
> > Ravenchief made it to the top of the shaft, but found that Trelos
> had
> > already broken through.  He flew up high over the street and tried
> to
> > track down the escapee.
> >
> > Lord Perseus got to the top moments later and saw the opening.  He
> > called in a lockdown order to the city, the followed the trail of
> > destruction being left by Trelos.

> > > > again!..... We'll get it open ASAP, Guardia is here, I'll have
> her
> > > and
> > > > anyone else around come with us to exit."
> > > > >

> > > > >
> > > > >

> > > > >                              The guard's condition was

> > > but
> > > > not critical, he had major
> > > > >  damage to the chest from the blaster shot, but Trelos hadnt

> > > > >  Meanwhile...
> > > > >

> > > > >  pursuers.  As soon as Perseus  noticed the bot had stopped,

> > > slowed
> > > > >  down and stopped some distance from the target, not wanting

> > > engage
> > > > >  by himself.

> was
> > > going
> > > > >  on, but shortly came to and charged down the hallway toward
> the
> > > exit.
> > > > >
